name: assessment
description: Create a web app using react, node, express, knex.js, and postgresql. App should take city name as input and display the results to user. User should be presented a save button, and if they click it, certain results should be sent to the server and stored in the DB. You can make your own github repos for these.

scripts.getDependencies: (cd server && npm install) & (cd client && npm install)
scripts.runApp: (cd server && npm start) & (cd client && npm start)
